instructions.ar: انعطف يساراً حاداً لتبقى على Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.da: Drej skarpt til venstre videre ad Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.de: Scharf links weiterfahren auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Make a sharp left to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege maldekstren al Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Gira a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fi: Jatka jyrkästi vasempaan pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Tourner franchement à gauche pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: פנה בחדות שמאלה כדי להישאר על Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.hu: Forduljon élesen balra, majd maradjon a Cool highway (Ref1) szakaszon
instructions.id: Make a sharp left to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Fai una curva stretta a sinistra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ja: 大きく左に曲がり、Cool highway(Ref1)を進む
instructions.ko: 급좌회전 하신 후 Cool highway (Ref1)로 가세요.
instructions.my: Cool highway( Ref1)ပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ဘယ်ဘက်ထောင့်ချိုးကွေ့ပါ
instructions.nl: Sla scherp links af om op Cool highway (Ref1) te blijven
instructions.no: Sving skarpt til venstre for å bli værende på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo w ostry zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva fechada a esquerda para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à esquerda para se manter em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ro: Virați puternic la stânga pe Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Резко поверните налево на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sl: Zavijte ostro levo, da ostanete na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng vänster och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sola keskin dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть різко ліворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Quẹo gắt bên trái để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.yo: Ṣe ọpa didasilẹ lati duro si Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.zh-Hans: 前方左急转弯，继续在Cool highway（Ref1）上行驶
